New Records: Chris Sale notched his major league-leading 15th win
Jorge Soler homered early and threw out a runner at the plate late
Key Match Events: Castro singled to center, Jeffers scored, Miranda to second
Olson doubled to center, Ozuna scored
Laureano singled to right, Olson scored
Williams doubled to left, Murphy scored and Arcia scored
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota
Umpires: Jeremie Rehak, Bruce Dreckman, Mark Wegner, Clint Vondrak
Others: The Braves swept the Twins in the three-game series
